title: The glory and happines of a true Christian A sermon preached by Master Rogers at Needham in Norfolke the 28 of Iune. 1617
author: Rogers, John, of Chacombe.
publisher: Printed by W. I[ones] for T. P[avier] dwelling in Iuie laine,
notes: Some print faded and show-through; D8 stained.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
